00075 static int return_editmesh_indexar(BMEditMesh *em, int *tot, int **indexar, float *cent)
00076 {
00077     BMVert *eve;
00078     BMIter iter;
00079     int *index, nr, totvert=0;
00080     
00081     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00082         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) totvert++;
00083     }
00084     if (totvert==0) return 0;
00085     
00086     *indexar= index= MEM_mallocN(4*totvert, "hook indexar");
00087     *tot= totvert;
00088     nr= 0;
00089     zero_v3(cent);
00090     
00091     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00092         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00093             *index= nr; index++;
00094             add_v3_v3(cent, eve->co);
00095         }
00096         nr++;
00097     }
00098     
00099     mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f/(float)totvert);
00100     
00101     return totvert;
00102 }
00103 
00104 static int return_editmesh_vgroup(Object *obedit, BMEditMesh *em, char *name, float *cent)
00105 {
00106     zero_v3(cent);
00107 
00108     if (obedit->actdef) {
00109         const int defgrp_index= obedit->actdef-1;
00110         int totvert=0;
00111 
00112         MDeformVert *dvert;
00113         BMVert *eve;
00114         BMIter iter;
00115 
00116         /* find the vertices */
00117         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00118             dvert= CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00119 
00120             if (dvert) {
00121                 if (defvert_find_weight(dvert, defgrp_index) > 0.0f) {
00122                     add_v3_v3(cent, eve->co);
00123                     totvert++;
00124                 }
00125             }
00126         }
00127         if (totvert) {
00128             bDeformGroup *dg = BLI_findlink(&obedit->defbase, defgrp_index);
00129             BLI_strncpy(name, dg->name, sizeof(dg->name));
00130             mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f/(float)totvert);
00131             return 1;
00132         }
00133     }
00134     
00135     return 0;
00136 }   
00137 
00138 static void select_editbmesh_hook(Object *ob, HookModifierData *hmd)
00139 {
00140     Mesh *me= ob->data;
00141     BMEditMesh *em= me->edit_btmesh;
00142     BMVert *eve;
00143     BMIter iter;
00144     int index=0, nr=0;
00145     
00146     if (hmd->indexar == NULL)
00147         return;
00148     
00149     BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00150         if (nr==hmd->indexar[index]) {
00151             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, eve, TRUE);
00152             if (index < hmd->totindex-1) index++;
00153         }
00154 
00155         nr++;
00156     }
00157 
00158     EDBM_select_flush(em);
00159 }

00161 static int return_editlattice_indexar(Lattice *editlatt, int *tot, int **indexar, float *cent)
00162 {
00163     BPoint *bp;
00164     int *index, nr, totvert=0, a;
00165     
00166     /* count */
00167     a= editlatt->pntsu*editlatt->pntsv*editlatt->pntsw;
00168     bp= editlatt->def;
00169     while (a--) {
00170         if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00171             if (bp->hide==0) totvert++;
00172         }
00173         bp++;
00174     }
00175 
00176     if (totvert==0) return 0;
00177     
00178     *indexar= index= MEM_mallocN(4*totvert, "hook indexar");
00179     *tot= totvert;
00180     nr= 0;
00181     zero_v3(cent);
00182     
00183     a= editlatt->pntsu*editlatt->pntsv*editlatt->pntsw;
00184     bp= editlatt->def;
00185     while (a--) {
00186         if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00187             if (bp->hide==0) {
00188                 *index= nr; index++;
00189                 add_v3_v3(cent, bp->vec);
00190             }
00191         }
00192         bp++;
00193         nr++;
00194     }
00195     
00196     mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f/(float)totvert);
00197     
00198     return totvert;
00199 }
00200 
00201 static void select_editlattice_hook(Object *obedit, HookModifierData *hmd)
00202 {
00203     Lattice *lt= obedit->data, *editlt;
00204     BPoint *bp;
00205     int index=0, nr=0, a;
00206 
00207     editlt= lt->editlatt->latt;
00208     /* count */
00209     a= editlt->pntsu*editlt->pntsv*editlt->pntsw;
00210     bp= editlt->def;
00211     while (a--) {
00212         if (hmd->indexar[index]==nr) {
00213             bp->f1 |= SELECT;
00214             if (index < hmd->totindex-1) index++;
00215         }
00216         nr++;
00217         bp++;
00218     }
00219 }

00221 static int return_editcurve_indexar(Object *obedit, int *tot, int **indexar, float *cent)
00222 {
00223     ListBase *editnurb= object_editcurve_get(obedit);
00224     Nurb *nu;
00225     BPoint *bp;
00226     BezTriple *bezt;
00227     int *index, a, nr, totvert=0;
00228     
00229     for (nu= editnurb->first; nu; nu= nu->next) {
00230         if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00231             bezt= nu->bezt;
00232             a= nu->pntsu;
00233             while (a--) {
00234                 if (bezt->f1 & SELECT) totvert++;
00235                 if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) totvert++;
00236                 if (bezt->f3 & SELECT) totvert++;
00237                 bezt++;
00238             }
00239         }
00240         else {
00241             bp= nu->bp;
00242             a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv;
00243             while (a--) {
00244                 if (bp->f1 & SELECT) totvert++;
00245                 bp++;
00246             }
00247         }
00248     }
00249     if (totvert==0) return 0;
00250     
00251     *indexar= index= MEM_mallocN(4*totvert, "hook indexar");
00252     *tot= totvert;
00253     nr= 0;
00254     zero_v3(cent);
00255     
00256     for (nu= editnurb->first; nu; nu= nu->next) {
00257         if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00258             bezt= nu->bezt;
00259             a= nu->pntsu;
00260             while (a--) {
00261                 if (bezt->f1 & SELECT) {
00262                     *index= nr; index++;
00263                     add_v3_v3(cent, bezt->vec[0]);
00264                 }
00265                 nr++;
00266                 if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) {
00267                     *index= nr; index++;
00268                     add_v3_v3(cent, bezt->vec[1]);
00269                 }
00270                 nr++;
00271                 if (bezt->f3 & SELECT) {
00272                     *index= nr; index++;
00273                     add_v3_v3(cent, bezt->vec[2]);
00274                 }
00275                 nr++;
00276                 bezt++;
00277             }
00278         }
00279         else {
00280             bp= nu->bp;
00281             a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv;
00282             while (a--) {
00283                 if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00284                     *index= nr; index++;
00285                     add_v3_v3(cent, bp->vec);
00286                 }
00287                 nr++;
00288                 bp++;
00289             }
00290         }
00291     }
00292     
00293     mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f/(float)totvert);
00294     
00295     return totvert;
00296 }
00297 
00298 static int object_hook_index_array(Scene *scene, Object *obedit, int *tot, int **indexar, char *name, float *cent_r)
00299 {
00300     *indexar= NULL;
00301     *tot= 0;
00302     name[0]= 0;
00303     
00304     switch(obedit->type) {
00305         case OB_MESH:
00306         {
00307             Mesh *me= obedit->data;
00308 
00309             BMEditMesh *em;
00310 
00311             EDBM_mesh_load(obedit);
00312             EDBM_mesh_make(scene->toolsettings, scene, obedit);
00313 
00314             em = me->edit_btmesh;
00315 
00316             /* check selected vertices first */
00317             if ( return_editmesh_indexar(em, tot, indexar, cent_r)) {
00318                 return 1;
00319             }
00320             else {
00321                 int ret = return_editmesh_vgroup(obedit, em, name, cent_r);
00322                 return ret;
00323             }
00324         }
00325         case OB_CURVE:
00326         case OB_SURF:
00327             return return_editcurve_indexar(obedit, tot, indexar, cent_r);
00328         case OB_LATTICE:
00329         {
00330             Lattice *lt= obedit->data;
00331             return return_editlattice_indexar(lt->editlatt->latt, tot, indexar, cent_r);
00332         }
00333         default:
00334             return 0;
00335     }
00336 }
00337 
00338 static void select_editcurve_hook(Object *obedit, HookModifierData *hmd)
00339 {
00340     ListBase *editnurb= object_editcurve_get(obedit);
00341     Nurb *nu;
00342     BPoint *bp;
00343     BezTriple *bezt;
00344     int index=0, a, nr=0;
00345     
00346     for (nu= editnurb->first; nu; nu= nu->next) {
00347         if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00348             bezt= nu->bezt;
00349             a= nu->pntsu;
00350             while (a--) {
00351                 if (nr == hmd->indexar[index]) {
00352                     bezt->f1 |= SELECT;
00353                     if (index<hmd->totindex-1) index++;
00354                 }
00355                 nr++;
00356                 if (nr == hmd->indexar[index]) {
00357                     bezt->f2 |= SELECT;
00358                     if (index<hmd->totindex-1) index++;
00359                 }
00360                 nr++;
00361                 if (nr == hmd->indexar[index]) {
00362                     bezt->f3 |= SELECT;
00363                     if (index<hmd->totindex-1) index++;
00364                 }
00365                 nr++;
00366                 
00367                 bezt++;
00368             }
00369         }
00370         else {
00371             bp= nu->bp;
00372             a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv;
00373             while (a--) {
00374                 if (nr == hmd->indexar[index]) {
00375                     bp->f1 |= SELECT;
00376                     if (index<hmd->totindex-1) index++;
00377                 }
00378                 nr++;
00379                 bp++;
00380             }
00381         }
00382     }
00383 }
00384 
00385 static void object_hook_select(Object *ob, HookModifierData *hmd) 
00386 {
00387     if (hmd->indexar == NULL)
00388         return;
00389     
00390     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) select_editbmesh_hook(ob, hmd);
00391     else if (ob->type==OB_LATTICE) select_editlattice_hook(ob, hmd);
00392     else if (ob->type==OB_CURVE) select_editcurve_hook(ob, hmd);
00393     else if (ob->type==OB_SURF) select_editcurve_hook(ob, hmd);
00394 }
00395 
00396 /* special poll operators for hook operators */
00397 // TODO: check for properties window modifier context too as alternative?
00398 static int hook_op_edit_poll(bContext *C)
00399 {
00400     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00401     
00402     if (obedit) {
00403         if (ED_operator_editmesh(C)) return 1;
00404         if (ED_operator_editsurfcurve(C)) return 1;
00405         if (ED_operator_editlattice(C)) return 1;
00406         //if (ED_operator_editmball(C)) return 1;
00407     }
00408     
00409     return 0;
00410 }
00411 
00412 static Object *add_hook_object_new(Scene *scene, Object *obedit)
00413 {
00414     Base *base, *basedit;
00415     Object *ob;
00416 
00417     ob= add_object(scene, OB_EMPTY);
00418     
00419     basedit = object_in_scene(obedit, scene);
00420     base = object_in_scene(ob, scene);
00421     base->lay = ob->lay = obedit->lay;
00422     
00423     /* icky, add_object sets new base as active.
00424      * so set it back to the original edit object */
00425     scene->basact = basedit;
00426 
00427     return ob;
00428 }
00429 
00430 static void add_hook_object(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *obedit, Object *ob, int mode)
00431 {
00432     ModifierData *md=NULL;
00433     HookModifierData *hmd = NULL;
00434     float cent[3];
00435     int tot, ok, *indexar;
00436     char name[MAX_NAME];
00437     
00438     ok = object_hook_index_array(scene, obedit, &tot, &indexar, name, cent);
00439     
00440     if (!ok) return;    // XXX error("Requires selected vertices or active Vertex Group");
00441     
00442     if (mode==OBJECT_ADDHOOK_NEWOB && !ob) {
00443         
00444         ob = add_hook_object_new(scene, obedit);
00445         
00446         /* transform cent to global coords for loc */
00447         mul_v3_m4v3(ob->loc, obedit->obmat, cent);
00448     }
00449     
00450     md = obedit->modifiers.first;
00451     while (md && modifierType_getInfo(md->type)->type==eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform) {
00452         md = md->next;
00453     }
00454     
00455     hmd = (HookModifierData*) modifier_new(eModifierType_Hook);
00456     BLI_insertlinkbefore(&obedit->modifiers, md, hmd);
00457     BLI_snprintf(hmd->modifier.name, sizeof(hmd->modifier.name), "Hook-%s", ob->id.name+2);
00458     modifier_unique_name(&obedit->modifiers, (ModifierData*)hmd);
00459     
00460     hmd->object= ob;
00461     hmd->indexar= indexar;
00462     copy_v3_v3(hmd->cent, cent);
00463     hmd->totindex= tot;
00464     BLI_strncpy(hmd->name, name, sizeof(hmd->name));
00465     
00466     /* matrix calculus */
00467     /* vert x (obmat x hook->imat) x hook->obmat x ob->imat */
00468     /*        (parentinv         )                          */
00469     where_is_object(scene, ob);
00470     
00471     invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
00472     /* apparently this call goes from right to left... */
00473     mul_serie_m4(hmd->parentinv, ob->imat, obedit->obmat, NULL,
00474                  NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00475     
00476     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00477 }
00478 
00479 static int object_add_hook_selob_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00480 {
00481     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00482     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00483     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00484     Object *obsel=NULL;
00485     
00486     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_objects)
00487     {
00488         if (ob != obedit) {
00489             obsel = ob;
00490             break;
00491         }
00492     }
00493     CTX_DATA_END;
00494     
00495     if (!obsel) {
00496         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't add hook with no other selected objects");
00497         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00498     }
00499     
00500     add_hook_object(bmain, scene, obedit, obsel, OBJECT_ADDHOOK_SELOB);
00501     
00502     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, obedit);
00503     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00504 }
00505 
00506 void OBJECT_OT_hook_add_selobj(wmOperatorType *ot)
00507 {
00508     /* identifiers */
00509     ot->name = "Hook to Selected Object";
00510     ot->description = "Hook selected vertices to the first selected Object";
00511     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_hook_add_selob";
00512     
00513     /* api callbacks */
00514     ot->exec = object_add_hook_selob_exec;
00515     ot->poll = hook_op_edit_poll;
00516     
00517     /* flags */
00518     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00519 }

00521 static int object_add_hook_newob_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00522 {
00523     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00524     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00525     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00526 
00527     add_hook_object(bmain, scene, obedit, NULL, OBJECT_ADDHOOK_NEWOB);
00528     
00529     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
00530     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, obedit);
00531     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00532 }

00549 static int object_hook_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00550 {
00551     int num= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "modifier");
00552     Object *ob=NULL;
00553     HookModifierData *hmd=NULL;
00554 
00555     ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00556     hmd = (HookModifierData *)BLI_findlink(&ob->modifiers, num);
00557 
00558     if (!ob || !hmd) {
00559         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't find hook modifier");
00560         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00561     }
00562     
00563     /* remove functionality */
00564     
00565     BLI_remlink(&ob->modifiers, (ModifierData *)hmd);
00566     modifier_free((ModifierData *)hmd);
00567     
00568     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00569     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00570     
00571     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00572 }
00573 
00574 static EnumPropertyItem *hook_mod_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop), int *free)
00575 {   
00576     Object *ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00577     EnumPropertyItem tmp = {0, "", 0, "", ""};
00578     EnumPropertyItem *item= NULL;
00579     ModifierData *md = NULL;
00580     int a, totitem= 0;
00581     
00582     if (!ob)
00583         return DummyRNA_NULL_items;
00584     
00585     for (a=0, md=ob->modifiers.first; md; md= md->next, a++) {
00586         if (md->type==eModifierType_Hook) {
00587             tmp.value= a;
00588             tmp.icon = ICON_HOOK;
00589             tmp.identifier= md->name;
00590             tmp.name= md->name;
00591             RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &tmp);
00592         }
00593     }
00594     
00595     RNA_enum_item_end(&item, &totitem);
00596     *free= 1;
00597     
00598     return item;
00599 }
00600 
00601 void OBJECT_OT_hook_remove(wmOperatorType *ot)
00602 {
00603     PropertyRNA *prop;
00604     
00605     /* identifiers */
00606     ot->name = "Remove Hook";
00607     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_hook_remove";
00608     ot->description = "Remove a hook from the active object";
00609     
00610     /* api callbacks */
00611     ot->exec = object_hook_remove_exec;
00612     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
00613     ot->poll = hook_op_edit_poll;
00614     
00615     /* flags */
00616     /* this operator removes modifier which isn't stored in local undo stack,
00617      * so redoing it from redo panel gives totally weird results  */
00618     ot->flag = /*OPTYPE_REGISTER|*/OPTYPE_UNDO;
00619     
00620     /* properties */
00621     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "modifier", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Modifier", "Modifier number to remove");
00622     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, hook_mod_itemf);
00623     ot->prop = prop;
00624 }
00625 
00626 static int object_hook_reset_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00627 {
00628     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "modifier", &RNA_HookModifier);
00629     int num= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "modifier");
00630     Object *ob=NULL;
00631     HookModifierData *hmd=NULL;
00632     
00633     if (ptr.data) {     /* if modifier context is available, use that */
00634         ob = ptr.id.data;
00635         hmd= ptr.data;
00636     } 
00637     else {          /* use the provided property */
00638         ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00639         hmd = (HookModifierData *)BLI_findlink(&ob->modifiers, num);
00640     }
00641     if (!ob || !hmd) {
00642         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't find hook modifier");
00643         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00644     }
00645     
00646     /* reset functionality */
00647     if (hmd->object) {
00648         bPoseChannel *pchan= get_pose_channel(hmd->object->pose, hmd->subtarget);
00649         
00650         if (hmd->subtarget[0] && pchan) {
00651             float imat[4][4], mat[4][4];
00652             
00653             /* calculate the world-space matrix for the pose-channel target first, then carry on as usual */
00654             mult_m4_m4m4(mat, hmd->object->obmat, pchan->pose_mat);
00655             
00656             invert_m4_m4(imat, mat);
00657             mul_serie_m4(hmd->parentinv, imat, ob->obmat, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00658         }
00659         else {
00660             invert_m4_m4(hmd->object->imat, hmd->object->obmat);
00661             mul_serie_m4(hmd->parentinv, hmd->object->imat, ob->obmat, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00662         }
00663     }
00664     
00665     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00666     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00667     
00668     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00669 }
00670 
00671 void OBJECT_OT_hook_reset(wmOperatorType *ot)
00672 {
00673     PropertyRNA *prop;
00674     
00675     /* identifiers */
00676     ot->name = "Reset Hook";
00677     ot->description = "Recalculate and clear offset transformation";
00678     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_hook_reset";
00679     
00680     /* callbacks */
00681     ot->exec = object_hook_reset_exec;
00682     ot->poll = hook_op_edit_poll;
00683     
00684     /* flags */
00685     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00686     
00687     /* properties */
00688     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "modifier", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Modifier", "Modifier number to assign to");
00689     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, hook_mod_itemf);
00690 }
00691 
00692 static int object_hook_recenter_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00693 {
00694     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "modifier", &RNA_HookModifier);
00695     int num= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "modifier");
00696     Object *ob=NULL;
00697     HookModifierData *hmd=NULL;
00698     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00699     float bmat[3][3], imat[3][3];
00700     
00701     if (ptr.data) {     /* if modifier context is available, use that */
00702         ob = ptr.id.data;
00703         hmd= ptr.data;
00704     } 
00705     else {          /* use the provided property */
00706         ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00707         hmd = (HookModifierData *)BLI_findlink(&ob->modifiers, num);
00708     }
00709     if (!ob || !hmd) {
00710         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't find hook modifier");
00711         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00712     }
00713     
00714     /* recenter functionality */
00715     copy_m3_m4(bmat, ob->obmat);
00716     invert_m3_m3(imat, bmat);
00717     
00718     sub_v3_v3v3(hmd->cent, scene->cursor, ob->obmat[3]);
00719     mul_m3_v3(imat, hmd->cent);
00720     
00721     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00722     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00723     
00724     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00725 }
00726 
00727 void OBJECT_OT_hook_recenter(wmOperatorType *ot)
00728 {
00729     PropertyRNA *prop;
00730     
00731     /* identifiers */
00732     ot->name = "Recenter Hook";
00733     ot->description = "Set hook center to cursor position";
00734     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_hook_recenter";
00735     
00736     /* callbacks */
00737     ot->exec = object_hook_recenter_exec;
00738     ot->poll = hook_op_edit_poll;
00739     
00740     /* flags */
00741     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00742     
00743     /* properties */
00744     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "modifier", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Modifier", "Modifier number to assign to");
00745     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, hook_mod_itemf);
00746 }
00747 
00748 static int object_hook_assign_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00749 {
00750     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00751     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "modifier", &RNA_HookModifier);
00752     int num= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "modifier");
00753     Object *ob=NULL;
00754     HookModifierData *hmd=NULL;
00755     float cent[3];
00756     char name[MAX_NAME];
00757     int *indexar, tot;
00758     
00759     if (ptr.data) {     /* if modifier context is available, use that */
00760         ob = ptr.id.data;
00761         hmd= ptr.data;
00762     } 
00763     else {          /* use the provided property */
00764         ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00765         hmd = (HookModifierData *)BLI_findlink(&ob->modifiers, num);
00766     }
00767     if (!ob || !hmd) {
00768         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't find hook modifier");
00769         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00770     }
00771     
00772     /* assign functionality */
00773     
00774     if (!object_hook_index_array(scene, ob, &tot, &indexar, name, cent)) {
00775         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "Requires selected vertices or active vertex group");
00776         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00777     }
00778     if (hmd->indexar)
00779         MEM_freeN(hmd->indexar);
00780     
00781     copy_v3_v3(hmd->cent, cent);
00782     hmd->indexar= indexar;
00783     hmd->totindex= tot;
00784     
00785     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00786     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00787     
00788     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00789 }
00790 
00791 void OBJECT_OT_hook_assign(wmOperatorType *ot)
00792 {
00793     PropertyRNA *prop;
00794     
00795     /* identifiers */
00796     ot->name = "Assign to Hook";
00797     ot->description = "Assign the selected vertices to a hook";
00798     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_hook_assign";
00799     
00800     /* callbacks */
00801     ot->exec = object_hook_assign_exec;
00802     ot->poll = hook_op_edit_poll;
00803     
00804     /* flags */
00805     /* this operator changes data stored in modifier which doesn't get pushed to undo stack,
00806      * so redoing it from redo panel gives totally weird results  */
00807     ot->flag = /*OPTYPE_REGISTER|*/OPTYPE_UNDO;
00808     
00809     /* properties */
00810     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "modifier", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Modifier", "Modifier number to assign to");
00811     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, hook_mod_itemf);
00812 }
00813 
00814 static int object_hook_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00815 {
00816     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "modifier", &RNA_HookModifier);
00817     int num= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "modifier");
00818     Object *ob=NULL;
00819     HookModifierData *hmd=NULL;
00820     
00821     if (ptr.data) {     /* if modifier context is available, use that */
00822         ob = ptr.id.data;
00823         hmd= ptr.data;
00824     } 
00825     else {          /* use the provided property */
00826         ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00827         hmd = (HookModifierData *)BLI_findlink(&ob->modifiers, num);
00828     }
00829     if (!ob || !hmd) {
00830         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't find hook modifier");
00831         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00832     }
00833     
00834     /* select functionality */
00835     object_hook_select(ob, hmd);
00836     
00837     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, ob->data);
00838     
00839     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00840 }
